purpleculture_pinyin:
zhuāng
(of a woman) to adorn oneself; makeup; adornment; trousseau; stage makeup and costume
(женщины), чтобы украсить себя; макияж, мириться; украшение; приданое; сценический грим и костюм
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 妆)
Pictophonetic: 爿 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 爿 [ qiáng ] half of a tree trunk
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
heisig_chinese_memo: These girls put on makeup while sitting on bunk beds at their slumber party. Their favorite color is turtle green.&nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: zhuāng: (графема) сценический костюм и грим; женские украшения; приданое; наносить макияж
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This woman likes to put on makeup, especially turtle green.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscriptions start with " female " and "爿" sound. Seal inscriptions are the same as oracle bones and inscriptions. The original meaning is decoration, dressing, and later it is the decoration on women. "Said Wen": "Makeup, decorate. From a female, the bed saves the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Makeup, decorate also. The meaning of this decoration is also extended. Song Yufu said: "Beauty beauty, do not wait for decoration." "Shanglin Fu": "Fuqi engraved decorations." Qian, vulgar characters. Pretenders, borrowed characters. From female, 爿sheng."

The inscriptions of the word " makeup " are all from " female " and "爿". The so-called "Bed Shengsheng " in "Shuowen" is absurd from ancient characters.

Inscriptions are used as the names of people, such as "Collection" 5652: "Witch makeup", which means a wizard named makeup. The meaning of " makeup " in this sentence is unknown (see Liu Xinglong).

Bronze writing is used as a person's name and is seen in Fanzizhuang 𠤳.

Bamboo and silk are often used as " Zhuang ", such as "Guodian Jian. "Bao Yi" Jian 23 quoted "Ji Gong Zhi Widow (Gu) Ming": "makeup sentence (after)". Today's "Yi Zhou Shu. Public offering solution "" makeup "for the" village "solemn representation, the whole sentence was intended that the Queen solemn.

" Make-up " is also commonly used as " dress ", such as the third fold of the third book of "West Chamber": "make-up deaf and dumb.

Ancient poems use their original meanings, such as "Drinking the lake at the beginning of the sun and rain": "If you want to make the West Lake better than the West, light makeup is always suitable"; also use its extended meaning, such as "Mulan Poetry": "Amei Wenjie, come home Li Hongzhuang."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription from " female ", "爿" sound, the original meaning is decoration, dress.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「女」，「爿」聲，篆文與甲骨、金文形同，本義為修飾，打扮，後引申為女子身上的裝飾。《說文》：「妝，飾也。从女，牀省聲。」段玉裁注：「妝，飾也。此飾篆引伸之義也。宋玉賦曰：『體美容冶，不待飾装。』〈上林賦〉：『靘䊋刻飾。』䊋者，俗字。裝者，叚借字。从女，爿聲。」

　　「妝」字之甲金文皆從「女」，「爿」聲，《說文》所謂「牀省聲」無稽於古文字。

　　卜辭用作人名，如《合集》5652：「巫妝」，意謂名為妝的巫師。此句中的「妝」一說用義不明（參劉興隆）。

　　金文用作人名，見於鄦子妝𠤳。

　　簡帛通作「莊」，如《郭店簡．緇衣》簡23引〈祭公之寡（顧）命〉：「妝句（后）」。今本《逸周書．祭公解》「妝」作「莊」，表示莊重，全句意謂莊重的皇后。

　　「妝」亦通作「裝」，如《西廂記》第三本第三折：「妝聾做啞」。

　　古詩用其本義，如〈飲湖上初晴復雨〉：「欲把西湖比西子，淡妝濃抹總相宜」；也用其引申義，如〈木蘭詩〉：「阿妹聞姊來，當戶理紅妝」。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「女」，「爿」聲，本義為修飾，打扮。

Chinese Definition:

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 爿 [ qiáng ] half of a tree trunk

①修飾、打扮：化妝。妝飾。妝點。
②供打扮用的物品，演員的衣裝服飾：上妝。卸妝。
③女子出嫁時陪送的衣物：嫁妝。
④修飾，打扮的式樣：時妝。古妝。
(Simplified: 妆)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 爿 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: These girls put on makeup while sitting on bunk beds at their slumber party. Their favorite color is turtle green. 
Meaning: put on makeup
Hanzi: 妆
Story: This woman likes to put on makeup, especially turtle green.
Kind: traditional

甲金文從「 女 」，「 爿 」聲，篆文與甲骨、金文形同，本義為修飾，打扮，後引申為女子身上的裝飾。《說文》：「妝，飾也。从女，牀省聲。」段玉裁注：「妝，飾也。此飾篆引伸之義也。宋玉賦曰：『體美容冶，不待飾装。』〈上林賦〉：『靘䊋刻飾。』䊋者，俗字。裝者，叚借字。从女，爿聲。」 「 妝 」字之甲金文皆從「 女 」，「 爿 」聲，《說文》所謂「牀省聲」無稽於古文字。 卜辭用作人名，如《合集》5652：「巫妝」，意謂名為妝的巫師。此句中的「 妝 」一說用義不明（參劉興隆）。 金文用作人名，見於鄦子妝𠤳。 簡帛通作「 莊 」，如《郭店簡．緇衣》簡23引〈祭公之寡（顧）命〉：「妝句（后）」。今本《逸周書．祭公解》「 妝 」作「 莊 」，表示莊重，全句意謂莊重的皇后。 「 妝 」亦通作「 裝 」，如《西廂記》第三本第三折：「妝聾做啞」。 古詩用其本義，如〈飲湖上初晴復雨〉：「欲把西湖比西子，淡妝濃抹總相宜」；也用其引申義，如〈木蘭詩〉：「阿妹聞姊來，當戶理紅妝」。

The original meaning is decoration, dressing, and later it is the decoration on women. "Said Wen": "Makeup, decorate. From a female, the bed saves the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Makeup, decorate also. The meaning of this decoration is also extended. Song Yufu said: "Beauty beauty, do not wait for decoration." "Shanglin Fu": "Fuqi engraved decorations." Qian, vulgar characters. Pretenders, borrowed characters. From female, 爿sheng." The inscriptions of the word " makeup" are all from " female" and " 爿". The so-called "Bed Shengsheng" in "Shuowen" is absurd from ancient characters. Inscriptions are used as the names of people, such as "Collection" 5652: "Witch makeup", which means a wizard named makeup. The meaning of " makeup" in this sentence is unknown (see Liu Xinglong). Bronze writing is used as a person's name and is seen in Fanzizhuang 𠤳. Bamboo and silk are often used as " Zhuang", such as "Guodian Jian. "Bao Yi" Jian 23 quoted "Ji Gong Zhi Widow (Gu) Ming": "makeup sentence (after)". Today's "Yi Zhou Shu. 妝字的基本解释

妝
zhuāng
见“妆”。

妝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuāng］
［《廣韻》側羊切，平陽，莊。］
亦作“娤1”。“妆1”的繁体字。
(1)梳妆打扮。
(2)指女子身上的妆饰。
(3)女子妆饰的式样。
(4)嫁妆。
(5)假装；装扮。
(6)古代云南地区使用贝币的单位。

妝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妝； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第30
【廣韻】【集韻】側羊切【正韻】側霜切，?音莊。【說文】飾也。【司馬相如·上林賦】靚妝刻飾。【後漢·梁冀傳】冀妻孫壽，美而善爲疾態，作愁眉啼妝。【天寶遺事】妃?施粉于兩頰，號淚妝。識者以爲不祥。【通鑑】周天元帝禁天下婦女施粉黛，皆黃眉黑妝。　从女，牀省聲。俗作粧娤。

妝字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
妝字的起名意思

暂无。

Makeup
Basic explanation of words
Makeup
zhuāng
See "makeup".
Makeup
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuāng］
["Guangyun" side sheep cut, Pingyang, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "娤1". Traditional characters for "妆1".
(1) Dressing up.
(2) Refers to the makeup on women.
(3) The style of women's makeup.
(4) The dowry.
(5) Pretend; dress up.
(6) The unit that used shell coins in ancient Yunnan.
Makeup
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　 Makeup; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 256 30
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Side Sheep Cut [Zheng Yun] Side Frost Cut,? Yinzhuang. [Said the text] also decorated. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Pretty makeup and engraving. [Later Han·Liang Ji Biography] Ji's wife Sun Shou, beautiful and good for illness, wore makeup. [Tianbao's legacy] Concubine? Apply powder to both cheeks to make tears. Those who know it are ominous. [Tong Jian] Emperor Zhou Tianyuan banned women from all over the world from applying powder and daisy, all with yellow eyebrows and black makeup.　Cong female, the bed saves the sound. Commonly used as makeup.
